title: Muscle relaxant and antipyretic effects of pentacyclic triterpenes isolated from the roots of Diospyros lotus L
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Ajmal Khan, Hamdy Kashtoh, Abdur Rauf, Sobia Ahsan Halim, Awan A. Aleem, Haji Bahadar, Huma Shareef, Fazal Mabood, Asaad Khalid, Kwang-Hyun Baek, Ahmed Al-Harrasi
